description:
Season Six Match
HOLLIE STEVENS
The Amazon
HT: 5'7
WT: 135 lbs
Season record (0-0)
Lifetime record (4-5)
Not Ranked
TRINA MICHAELS
Passion
HT: 5'6
WT: 135lbs
Season record (0-0)
Lifetime record (0-0)
Not Ranked
Welcome to the start of Season Six. A new season, with new wrestlers and amazing unscripted combat. A season that promises everything you have come to love and more.
Hollie Stevens is back! After missing all of season five with an injury, The Amazon is back and 100% healthy. Determined to make a new mark in US, Hollie is looking forward to some ass kicking in the weeks to come.
Trina Michaels and her triple D breasts storm into US. Always ready to foster new talent, we were happily amazed when Trina volunteered to wrestle. Look for more of Trina in the weeks and months to come.
Trina was no match for the veteran of 3 seasons. Hollie dominated from the start, and kept the newcomer in submission hold after submission hold. Trina was helpless as Holly had her way with her on the mat.
title: Hollie Stevens "The Amazon" (0-0) vs Trina Michaels "Passion" (0-0)
